attributes.action: Keep Wootton Bassett for Troop Repatriation
attributes.additional_details: I wish the Government to keep Wootton Bassett as the place where all our fallen Hero's are brought back to the UK, why this was changed makes absolutly no sense what so ever, please revert back to a status Quo on this issue. The new facility is like bringing our men back through the back door, not good enough.
